name: Apollonian Might
description:
Apollonian Might is a topdown multiplayer game based in dual mythology. In the beginning there were two cosmic forces. The Celestials and the Eldritch. After eons of rivalry, a third faction of aberrations known as "the Strangers" dominated and threaten both Celestials and the Eldritch. Now the two cosmic forces must fight against this common enemy in order to restore balance in the universe.

This game requires 2 players.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Q & E - choose between Celestial [Q] and Eldritch [E] at the beginning
123 - switching weapon

  1. Sword/Melee
  2. Crossbow/Projectile
  3. Shield

LeftMouseButton - fire

The shield only defends agains projectile attacks. It cannot block sword attacks.
